set.name: DMR-21 Team Hamukatsu and Dogiragon Buster

property.name: Rules
property.value: Revolution Change: Light or Nature Dragon that costs 5 or more Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields) Your opponent's creatures that cost less than the number of cards in your mana zone are put into the battle zone tapped. Final Revolution - If you put this creature into the battle zone through 'Revolution Change' and you didn't use 'Final Revolution' during this turn, put all creatures that have power less than this creature into their owner's mana zones.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Revolution Change: Fire or Nature Dragon that costs 5 or more Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields) Each of your multicolored creatures gets 'speed attacker'. Final Revolution - If you put this creature into the battle zone through 'Revolution Change' and you didn't use 'Final Revolution' during this turn, put any number of non-evolution multicolored creatures from your hand or mana zone that have total cost 6 or less into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) At the end of your turn, you may draw a card. Then you may put a creature that costs 3 or less from your hand into the battle zone. At the start of your turn, if you have a D2 Field and 4 or more creatures that have the same name in the battle zone, you win the game.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Gravity Zeroâ€•If you have 5 or more water creatures in the battle zone, you may summon this creature for no cost. Your creatures can't be attacked. Whenever your opponent would choose a creature due to the effect of a spell, if you have a D2 Field in the battle zone, they can't choose your creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy one of your creatures. If you do, draw 2 cards. When this creature or one of your other creatures are destroyed, if you have a D2 Field in the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed attacker(This creature doesn't get summoning sickness) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Whenever this creature wins a battle, if you have a D2 Field in the battle zone, untap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, reveal the top card of your deck until you reveal a non-multicolored card. Put all revealed cards into your mana zone.

card.name: Miracle Star, Heaven Revolutionary Knight Emperor

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) Revolution Change - Light or Water Dragon (When one of your light or water dragons attack, you may switch that creature with this creature from your hand) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Whenever this creature would break one of your opponent's shields, your opponent turns that shield face up instead. You may cast a spell from among them for no cost, then put it into your opponent's graveyard. Then, your opponent puts that shield into his hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Revolution Change - Water or Darkness Dragon (When one of your water or darkness dragons attack, you may switch that creature with this creature from your hand) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures. Your opponent may destroy that creature. If they don't, return all of their creatures to their hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) Revolution Change - Darkness or Fire Dragon(When one of your darkness or fire Dragons attack, you may switch that creature with this creature from your hand) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may discard a creature from your hand. If you do, destroy one of your opponent's creatures. If you have 5 or more creatures in your graveyard, this creature can't be destroyed while battling.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) Speed attacker(This creature doesn't get summoning sickness) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Whenever this creature attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a D2 Field, Initials or Sonic Command, add it to your hand. If you have a D2 Field in the battle zone, you may put it into the battle zone instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) At the end of each of your turns, you may put your hand into your mana zone. If you do, draw 3 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​​ {BLOCKER} ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Whenever this creature attacks, tap all non-light creatures in the battle zone. When this creature would leave the battle zone, if it's untapped, it stays in the battle zone instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you summon another creature, you may destroy that creature. If you do, reveal the top card of your deck. If it has the same civilization as the destroyed creature, put that creature into the battle zone. If it doesn't, add it to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may summon this creature by destroying one of your creatures, putting the top card of your deck into your graveyard, and discarding a card from your hand instead of paying its cost. When you summon this creature, put all creatures that have the same name as this creature from your graveyard into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one of your creatures would leave the battle zone, put a seal on that creature instead. (When you seal a card, put the top card of your deck on that card face down. Whenever a Command is put into the battle zone, its owner puts a seal from one of his cards that has the same civilization as that Command into his graveyard. While a creature is sealed, both players ignore that creature) (Whenever another D2 Field is put into the battle zone, put this D2 Field into your graveyard)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Whenever you put this creature into the battle zone or attacks, reveal the top card of your deck and add it to your hand. If its a creature, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power less than the revealed creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may summon creatures that cost 1 from your mana zone. If you have a D2 Field in the battle zone, this creature gets +6000 power and breaks an additional shield for each of your other nature creatures in the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) ​​ {BLOCKER} Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields) Your opponent's creatures break 1 less shield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) Whenever you put another multicolored creature into the battle zone, draw a card. Your multicolored cards are put into your mana zone untapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) Double breaker When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top 5 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Whenever this creature attacks, you may choose a spell from your graveyard and cast it for no cost. If you do, put that spell on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed attacker(This creature doesn't get summoning sickness) When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your graveyard. Then return a creature from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Speed attacker(This creature doesn't get summoning sickness) Whenever your opponent's creatures attack, they must attack this creature if able. When this creature would be discarded by one of your opponent's spell effect or creature ability, you may put it into the battle zone instead.

card.name: Miranda Kerr, Rainbow Guard Dragon Elemental

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever your opponent would choose a creature in the battle zone, they can't choose one of your multicolored creatures.(They can still be attacked and blocked)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each of your creatures gets 'escape'.(When a creature that has 'escape' would be destroyed, you may add one of your shields to your hand instead. You can't use the 'shield trigger' ability of that shield) (Whenever another D2 Field is put into the battle zone, put this D2 Field into your graveyard)

property.name: Rules
property.value: While you have 3 or more creatures in the battle zone, this creature can't be blocked, your opponent can't choose this creature in the battle zone, and whenever this creature attacks, draw 2 cards.(It can still be attacked)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you put a creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card. (Whenever another D2 Field is put into the battle zone, put this D2 Field into your graveyard)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one of your creatures is destroyed, choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature gets -4000 power until the end of the turn. (Whenever another D2 Field is put into the battle zone, put this D2 Field into your graveyard)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one of your creatures wins a battle, that creature breaks one of your opponent's shields. (Whenever another D2 Field is put into the battle zone, put this D2 Field into your graveyard)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, untap all Dreammates and Giants in your mana zone. Your other Giants that cost 7 or more get +5000 power and break an additional shield.

card.name: Zundoko Sunny Stage, Flowery Way of D

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you put a creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. (Whenever another D2 Field is put into the battle zone, put this D2 Field into your graveyard)

card.name: White Cry, Rainbow Color Dragon Elemental

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When this creature leaves the battle zone, return all non-multicolored creatures to their owner's hands.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) Revolution Change - Light or Water Dragon (When one of your light or water dragons attack, you may switch that creature with this creature from your hand) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When this creature is destroyed or if your one of your shields are broken while this creature is tapped, skip the rest of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) Revolution Change - Light or Nature dragon (When one of your light or nature dragons attack, you may switch that creature with this creature from your hand) ​​ {BLOCKER} ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. Then you may return a multicolored card from your mana zone to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Revolution 0 Trigger - Whenever a creature attacks, if you have no shields, you may cast this spell for no cost. Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a light or nature non-evolution creature, put it into the battle zone. Until the start of your next turn, that creature gets 'blocker.' At the start of your next turn, put that creature into your mana zone. After you cast this spell, shuffle it into your deck instead of your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) Revolution Change - Water or Darkness dragon (When one of your water or darkness dragons attack, you may switch that creature with this creature from your hand) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent may choose 2 creatures in your graveyard. If your opponent does, return them to your hand. If your opponent doesn't or they can't, draw 2 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) ​ {SHIELD TRIGGER} Slayer(Whenever this creature battles, destroy the other creature after the battle) When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's non-multicolored creatures and return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) Revolution Change - Darkness or Fire Dragon (When one of your darkness or fire dragons attack, you may switch that creature with this creature from your hand) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may discard a creature from your hand. If you do, your opponent chooses 2 cards from their hand and discards them.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) Revolution Change - Fire or Nature Dragon (When one of your fire or nature dragons attack, you may switch that creature with this creature from your hand) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may look at the top 4 cards of your deck, You may choose a multicolored creature from them, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped) Revolution 0 Trigger - Whenever a creature attacks, if you have no shields, you may cast this spell for no cost. Reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has less power than a fire creature from among them, and put a nature creature from among them into your mana zone. After you cast this spell, shuffle it into your deck instead of your graveyard.

property.value: Your Giants cost up to 3 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less. When you put a Giant into the battle zone, put this creature into your mana zone.
